name: thread-mcp
description: Save, search, update, and resume AI conversation threads locally or remotely. Supports Markdown/JSON formats with rich metadata, smart search, and context-optimized resumption.

tools.name: save_thread
tools.description: Save a conversation thread to local storage or a remote server

tools.name: find_threads
tools.description: Find saved conversation threads by ID, title, query, or filters

tools.name: update_thread
tools.description: Update an existing conversation thread with new messages or metadata

tools.name: delete_thread
tools.description: Delete a saved conversation thread by ID or title

tools.name: resume_thread
tools.description: Load a saved conversation thread to continue where you left off
